title: Game Abandoned, Game Over
body:
starts of with weird server lag. every1 on both teams are dc'd at the same time, then reconnect about the same time, that's bad enough but 5 minutes of waiting for every 1 min of actual gameplay i can handle. trouble starts after the match is over, it's a loss because adc's do work when nobody has any control and abilities won't activate. 
*w/e*, match to next game, hopefully server doesn't bug out again, however, i can't says i'm still connected to a game in progress. however, i know the game is over, i pressed the big button on the defeat screen, skipped waiting for the stats. 
Now when i log on to lol i'm sitting at the game abandoned screen. 
and i know the game has abandoned me, lost and alone, with no way to queue.
I can't reconnect to a game that isn't there. Is this going to last forever...(*edit/ didn't last long enough for me to sub a ticket)
am i in *purgatory?*
anyway i'll sub a ticket, but if any of you know **anything** let me know.


* i would like to report riot servers for trolling

replies.body: 1 hour later, i'm warped to the lobby
